trans-unit.source: Represents a discovery document.
This class cannot be inherited.
XML Web services discovery involves discovering the available XML Web services, given an URL.
The URL typically points to a discovery document, which usually has a.disco file name extension.

The discovery document, which is an XML document, contains references to information about the existance of XML Web services, such as a service description, XML Schema Definition (XSD) language schema, or another discovery document.

This class represents the contents of the discovery document; where the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument.References%2A> property contains a list of the references contained within the discovery document.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref> class.
Returns a value indicating whether the passed <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> can be deserialized into a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> that is tested whether it can be deserialized into a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref>.
`true` if <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> can be deserialized into a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.
Namespace of the discovery XML element of a discovery document.
A discovery document contains references to documents describing Web Services.
These references are XML elements contained within a discovery XML element.
That discovery XML element is a member of the XML namespace specified by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument.Namespace> constant.
Reads and returns a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref> from the passed <xref href="System.IO.Stream"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.IO.Stream"></xref> from which to read the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref> containing the contents of a discovery document from the passed <xref href="System.IO.Stream"></xref>.
Reads and returns a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref> from the passed <xref href="System.IO.TextReader"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref> containing the contents of a discovery document from the passed <xref href="System.IO.TextReader"></xref>.
Reads and returns a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref> from the passed <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> from which to read the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref> containing the contents of a discovery document from the passed <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref>.
A list of references contained within the discovery document.
A discovery document contains references to information about the existence of XML Web services.
These references can refer to service descriptions, XSD schemas, or other discovery documents.
The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument.References%2A> property contains a list of these references.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IList"></xref> containing the references within the discovery document.
Writes this <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref> into the passed <xref href="System.IO.Stream"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.IO.Stream"></xref> into which this <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref> is written.
Writes this <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref> into the passed <xref href="System.IO.TextWriter"></xref>.
Writes this <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref> into the passed <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref>.
